document_data.name: Tanners' Council
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tanners' Council''' was the guildhall for the tanners in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
document_data.Location: The guildhall was located along the [[High Road (Daggerford)|High Road]] just south of [[Rogar Alley]] in central of Daggerford near the [[Trade Way (Daggerford)|Trade Way]].
